Zelda.objects.friendly¶

Zelda.objects.friendly.Player¶

This module is used to operate with Player.

class Zelda.objects.friendly.Player.Player(level: Level, groups: tuple, position: Vector2)[source]¶

Bases: Entity

Player class.

Add dust to pay for stories.

Parameters:
